plot: After 40 years in exile, Yulparitja elders take Daniel Walbidi, their most promising young artist, back to the Australian desert heartland they left behind.
title: Desert Heart
plot_es: After 40 years in exile, Yulparitja elders take Daniel Walbidi, their most promising young artist, back to the Australian desert heartland they left behind.
plot_en: After 40 years in exile, Yulparitja elders take Daniel Walbidi, their most promising young artist, back to the Australian desert heartland they left behind.
